CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Engineering Department relative to Operations Staff?
SRP.A: Engineering Department is {above} Operations Staff in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total training hours?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Engineering Department}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total training hours?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Research & Development}.

VE.Q: What is Human Resources's Training Hours in 1979?
VE.A: Human Resources's training hours in 1979 is {20.52} hours/employee.

VE.Q: What is Research & Development's Training Hours in 1975?
VE.A: Research & Development's training hours in 1975 is {17.85} hours/employee.

VE.Q: What is Operations Staff's Training Hours in 1974?
VE.A: Operations Staff's training hours in 1974 is {20.84} hours/employee.

VE.Q: What are the training hours of Research & Development, Administrative Support, and Operations Staff in 1979?
VE.A: Research & Development's training hours is {13.92} hours/employee, Administrative Support's training hours is {14.90} hours/employee, Operations Staff's training hours is {27.05} hours/employee.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Training Hours in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum training hours is {13.44} hours/employee.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Training Hours in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum training hours is {32.56} hours/employee.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Training Hours level recorded for Administrative Support?
EVJ.A: Administrative Support reached approximately {20.06} hours/employee in {1974}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Training Hours level recorded for Administrative Support?
EVJ.A: Administrative Support's lowest recorded level is approximately {14.90} hours/employee in {1979}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Training Hours?
SC.A: The average total training hours is {145.83} hours/employee.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Training Hours go below 144.47 hours/employee? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Training Hours exceed 148.22 hours/employee? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Was the total Training Hours in 1974 higher or lower than in 1978?
NC.A: The total training hours in 1974 was {lower} than in 1978.

NC.Q: Between 1974 and 1977, did the total Training Hours experience a larger or smaller change than between 1976 and 1979?
NC.A: The change in total training hours between 1974 and 1977 was {larger} than between 1976 and 1979.

NC.Q: Was the total Training Hours in 1976 higher or lower than in 1977?
NC.A: The total training hours in 1976 was {higher} than in 1977.

NC.Q: Between 1974 and 1975, was the average total Training Hours higher or lower than between 1976 and 1979?
NC.A: The average total training hours between 1974 and 1975 was {lower} than between 1976 and 1979.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Engineering Department} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Sales Team, Research & Development, Administrative Support, Human Resources, Operations Staff, Management Team, Engineering Department}.
